text: @realDonaldTrump @OANN Riiiigghht.   And you just inspected the @WhiteHouse bunker for a brief inspection during the day. The overwhelming probability would be that a 75 year old White Male from upstate New York would be a Trump voter.  #BunkerBoy #coronavirus #BlackLivesMatter
